name: freetobook widget (legacy)
author: freetobook.com

sections.description:
The freetobook plugin is ideal for accommodation providers looking to add online booking functionality to their wordpress website.
You can choose to have a booking form where your customer enters dates or a simple “booking button”, both are linked to your rates and availability which you can update on freetobook.

To find out more and register for an account simply visit our website.
Please be aware that the freetobook plugin is only suitable for accommodation providers, do not register if you are not an accommodation provider.

Please note that this plugin is no longer maintained, please use the “Freetobook Responsive Widget” instead. Visit our website to find out more.
sections.installation:
How to manually install freetobook plugin

  1. Upload the freetobook plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enter your widget key in the settings panel

short_description: Add the freetobook booking button to your wordpress blog.
